nodes.text: The Thulia system was a star system located within the Kurost sector, a part of the galaxy's Mid Rim and the Slice regions. It was the origin point of Thulian vapor, a mixture of post-industrial airborne pollution and crystal fog.
The Thulia system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square Q-12.
